name: KickHim
description: Tired of neighbors or anyone around? Kick him - this is a very fun game for haters furious neighbors. You can choose different items that will be hitting it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 256 MB RAM Graphics: 256 mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 512 mb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card

reviews.review_text: 'Where a door closes it opens elsewhere'

This is pretty much whack a mole but instead of moles come out of the hole its people coming out the doors.. Gets boring quick and not fun. Maybe to test your reflexes but def not a game to consider getting
It's never a good sign when you finish a game before the 2nd trading card drops.   #bundlelife
